description: I. Letter dated 12/03/2008 from Philip Hunter, Chief Schools Adjudicator, to Derek Emmings, DCSF, regarding a proposed report on the entent to which school admission arrangements for 2009 are compliant with the Code and the law. II. Letter dated 17/03/2008 from Ed Balls MP to Philip Hunter regarding the schools admissions system.
department: Dept for Children Schools and Families Office of the Schools Adjudicator
